entry.title: Regulators are trying to make inroads into crypto but are they going too far? Watch @fallow8DeFi & Blockchain Law Professor @JWVerret break down the c...
entry.summary: Regulators are trying to make inroads into crypto but are they going too far? Watch @fallow8DeFi & Blockchain Law Professor @JWVerret break down the current state of regulation & the future implications. 🗓Sept 27 ⏰ 4pm UTC Set an alert: https://youtu.be/gkYXKUvvaNo

entry.title: ✨The DeFi Pulse Index is the leading benchmark of the decentralized finance sector. The index is maintained by DeFi Pulse's index division @Scalara_x...
entry.summary: ✨The DeFi Pulse Index is the leading benchmark of the decentralized finance sector. The index is maintained by DeFi Pulse's index division @Scalara_xyz and is available as a single token $DPI implemented by @indexcoop. Scalara: Over the last 7 days, the DeFi Pulse Index grew 10% when measured in ETH. $DPI Best performers were @compoundfinance, @aave and @iearnfinance. Compound was even up in USD terms, despite the overall market rout.

entry.title: RT Nathan Howard: It's been a busy month or so for crypto and DeFi regulation. Join us this Tuesday as @JWVerret helps make sense of it all (in a way ...
entry.summary: RT Nathan Howard It's been a busy month or so for crypto and DeFi regulation. Join us this Tuesday as @JWVerret helps make sense of it all (in a way that isn't legal advice). DeFi Pulse 🍇: Join host @fallow8DeFi as we kick off Money Legos: Building the Financial Infrastructure of the Future. The first topic is a hot one— the future of DeFi Regulation w/ Blockchain Law Professor @JWVerret. 🗓Sept 27 ⏰ 12pm EST/4pm UTC Set a reminder: https://youtu.be/gkYXKUvvaNo
